text: Parliamentary elections were held in Chile on 4 March 1973.Nohlen, D (2005) Elections in the Americas: A data handbook, Volume II, p262 The Confederation of Democracy alliance won a majority of seats in both the Chamber of Deputies and the Senate. ==Electoral system== The term length for Senators was eight years, with around half of the Senators elected every four years. This election saw 25 of the 50 Senate seats up for election. ==Results== ===Senate=== |- align=center ! style="background:#e9e9e9;" colspan="2"|Coalition ! style="background:#e9e9e9;" colspan="2"|Party !
